#include<cstdio>
#include<cstring>

//using namespace std;

int main()
{
	int testCases=0;
	scanf("%d",&testCases);
	int i=0;
	for(i=0;i<testCases;i++)
	{
		long int noA=0;
		scanf("%ld",&noA);
		
		char A[11]="0000000000";
		char B[11]="0000000000";
		
		long int noB=0;
		scanf("%ld",&noB);
		
		int temp=0;
		while(noA != 0)
		{
			temp = noA%10;
			noA=noA/10;
			A[temp]++;
		}
		
		while(noB != 0)
		{
			temp = noB%10;
			noB=noB/10;
			B[temp]++;
		}
		if(strcmp(A,B))
			printf("0\n");
		else
			printf("1\n");
		
	}
	return 0;
}
